page_contents.title: How we started.
page_contents.content: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.

page_contents.title: What We Do?
page_contents.content: Human Rights Protection Group & MFP Federation has fought and continues to fight for justice in cases where justice has been delayed and/or denied. We have played a major role in Jessica Lal case, Arushi murder case, Capt. Sumit Kohli case, Nirbhaya case and are pursuing the ongoing Sippy Sidhu case.

page_contents.title: Get Involved.
page_contents.content: We encourage you to get involved with us and stand up against human rights violations. Remember, if it can happen to someone else, it may happen to you tomorrow!

page_contents.title: Our Mission.
page_contents.content: Our mission is to make sure that justice is meted out to all irrespective of their position, power or economical background!
